title: r/Prorevenge How I Destroyed The Life Of My Roommate From Hell!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP has an absolutely awful roommate who violates their agreement and gives the apartment key to strange men, which puts OP's safety at risk. OP figures that if her roommate is going to put OP's safety at risk, then OP might as well return the favor! She finds a replacement roommate who has a revolving door of strange men coming in every night to give the roommate a taste of her own medicine!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
